question: Who among the following personalities founded Darul Uloom (1867) at Deoband?
explanation:
To propagate Islam and to train well-educated ulama dedicated to scriptural Islam, Muhammad Qasim Nanotvi and his followers
founded Darul Uloom (House of Knowledge) in 1867 at Deoband. The sole purpose of this Islamic school is to return muslims
to the basic texts of Islam and reject Western culture.
